entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 7:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 7:14 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:14 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:14 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
